api/overview.title: API Overview
api/overview.description: The Mesh API is organized around services that handle specific business domains.

examples/basic-usage.title: Basic Usage Examples
examples/basic-usage.description: This guide provides practical examples for common API operations using all three SDKs.

getting-started/installation.title: Installation
getting-started/installation.description: Get started with the Mesh API by installing the SDK for your preferred programming language.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.description: Welcome to the Mesh API Documentation - your comprehensive guide to integrating with the Mesh trading platform.

sdks/overview.title: SDK Overview
sdks/overview.description: Mesh provides official SDKs for Go, Python, and TypeScript, all generated from the same protobuf definitions
